title: The Hunger Games
author: suzanne-collins
summary: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in the annual Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death. The first book in a trilogy that sparked a major film franchise.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: The Hunger Games is a 2008 dystopian novel by the American writer Suzanne Collins. It is written in the perspective of 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who lives in the future, post-apocalyptic nation of Panem in North America. The Capitol, a highly advanced metropolis, exercises political control over the rest of the nation.
